segments.text: David , why didn ’ t you clean the room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m not in the mood .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was told my girlfriend was speaking ill of me . That ’ s a real let-down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t think she will do such a thing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But she did and made me disappointed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , cheer up . A girlfriend is not everything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But she means a lot to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . I just can ’ t forget it .
segments.speaker: S2
